entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:46 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: ESE 16 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to snow late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
